text: The 2014–15 LPB season was the 82nd season of the Liga Portuguesa de Basquetebol (LPB), the highest professional basketball league in Portugal. Three-time defending champions Benfica secured their 26th title after beating Vitória de Guimarães 3–0 in the playoff finals. ==Teams== Benfica was the defending champion and secured its 26th league title. Illiabum Clube, runner- up of the 2013–14 Proliga, promoted to LPB after the resignation of champion Dragon Force. ==Standings== ==Playoffs== ==References== ==External links== *FPB website Category:Liga Portuguesa de Basquetebol seasons Portuguese LPB
title: 2014–15 LPB season
